title: Jennifer Aniston jokes that she 'woke up like this' as she's surrounded by a slew of handlers
text:
She recently joined the ranks of Instagram users and broke the internet after garnering more than one million followers in five hours.

And in Jennifer Aniston's latest social media snap she paid tribute to Julia Roberts' memorable role in nineties hit Notting Hill with a sexy behind the scenes snap.

The actress, 50, played on the iconic 'I'm just a girl' quote in her new post, where she was seen posing in just a cosy white jumper with socks and sandals.

Hilarious: In Jennifer Aniston 's latest social media snap she paid tribute to Julia Roberts' memorable role in nineties hit Notting Hill with a sexy behind the scenes snap

She captioned the image: 'I’m just a girl....standing with hair and makeup. A stylist. A photographer, A lighting crew, wind machine, props, and a computer .... asking you to think I woke up like this.'

Jennifer's caption was taken from the moment in the film that Julia, who plays actress Anna Scott, stands in front of her on-screen love interest William Thacker [Hugh Grant] and asks him to take a chance on her.

The original quote reads: I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her.'

Iconic: Jennifer's caption was taken from the moment in the film that Julia, who plays actress Anna Scott, stands in front of her on-screen love interest William Thacker [Hugh Grant] and asks him to take a chance on her (pictured)

Wow! Jennifer looked incredible in the grabs from a photo shoot, wearing a long-sleeved white sweater fashioned into a dress

Jennifer looked incredible in the grabs from a photo shoot, wearing a long-sleeved white sweater fashioned into a dress.

She enlisted the help of her favourite and longtime hair guru, Chris McMillan, to tend to her blonde tresses.

Beloved Nina & Clare stylists tended to a pair of slouchy white socks around her ankles, which were teamed with strappy sandals.

She donned a white fedora over her silky tresses and flaunted a perfectly glam face with focus on her bright blue eyes.

Jennifer joined Instagram six days ago and accrued a total of 14 million likes on her first photo, which initially caused havoc for the social media site.

Forever: Jennifer joined Instagram six days ago and accrued a total of 14 million likes on her first photo, which initially caused havoc for the social media site

Instagram apologized for the delays on their platform, with a spokesperson telling Page Six: 'We are aware that some people are having issues following Jen's page — the volume of interest is incredible.'

She shared a glimpse into her past with a happy photo of her Friends co-stars during an impromptu reunion in LA.

Aniston starred on the popular sitcom during its entire 10-year run, working alongside Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matthew Perry, David Schwimmer and Matt LeBlanc.
description: The actress, 50, played on the iconic 'I'm just a girl' quote with her latest post, where she was seen posing in just a cosy white jumper with socks and sandals.
